title: convert2anndata
text: convert2anndata R package designed seamlessly convert SingleCellExperiment Seurat objects AnnData format, widely used single-cell data analysis. package supports conversion assays, dimensional reductions, metadata, cell--cell pairing data (e.g., distances), alternative experiments, ensuring comprehensive transfer information. encounter issues notice incomplete conversions, please feel free report GitHub issue tracker help us continuously improve.

title: convert2anndata
text: install convert2anndata package GitHub ssh, can use remotes package R. don’t remotes installed, can install first: , install necessary Bioconductor packages: Finally, install convert2anndata GitHub: Alternatively, install GitHub authenticating ssh:

title: convert2anndata
text: can set package dependencies project-specific environment using renv. approach ensures dependencies installed consistent environment. First, install renv don’t already : , can use following steps set environment install necessary packages, including Bioconductor packages, one go:
code: install.packages("renv") # Initialize renv in your project directory renv::init(bare=TRUE)  # Install the necessary packages, including Bioconductor packages renv::install(c(     "bioc::SingleCellExperiment",     "bioc::SummarizedExperiment",     "bioc::S4Vectors" ))      renv::install("git@github.com:settylab/convert2anndata.git")  # Snapshot the environment renv::snapshot(type="all")

title: convert2anndata
text: want convert Seurat objects, also need install Seurat package. Follow installation instructions Seurat website.

title: convert2anndata
text: Consider making alias command line tool, e.g., Now can use command line toole, explained Command Line Usage , just typing, e.g., c2a -h.

title: convert2anndata
text: can use convert2anndata package command line convert SingleCellExperiment Seurat objects stored RDS files AnnData format (H5AD files). example use : set alias, suggested Installation section, can also conviniently run

title: convert2anndata
text: -, --input: Path input RDS file containing SingleCellExperiment Seurat object. option required. -o, --output: Path output H5AD file. specified, output path derived replacing .rds extension input path .h5ad. -, --assay: assay use main matrix (anndata.X). Defaults ‘counts’. -d, --disable-recursive-altExp: Disable recursive recovery altExperiments discard instead. -h, --help: Show help massage exit.

title: convert2anndata
text: can also use convert2anndata package directly R. examples convert SingleCellExperiment Seurat objects AnnData format within R session.

title: convert2anndata
text: Find function documentation reference manual retrive documentation ?convert_to_anndata functions.
code: library(convert2anndata) library(anndata)  # Load a Seurat object seurat_obj <- readRDS("/path/to/input_file.rds")  # Convert to SingleCellExperiment if necessary sce <- convert_seurat_to_sce(seurat_obj)  # Convert to AnnData ad <- convert_to_anndata(sce, assayName = "counts", useAltExp = TRUE)  # Save the AnnData object write_h5ad(ad, "/path/to/output_file.h5ad")

text: SingleCellExperiment object.

title: Convert Seurat or Other Object to SingleCellExperiment — convert_seurat_to_sce
text: function first checks input object Seurat object. , prints summary object checks indicators Seurat v2, updating object necessary. converts Seurat object SingleCellExperiment. object already SingleCellExperiment, returned directly. object types, attempt made convert SingleCellExperiment.

title: Convert Seurat or Other Object to SingleCellExperiment — convert_seurat_to_sce
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(Seurat) library(SingleCellExperiment) seurat_obj <- CreateSeuratObject(counts = matrix(1:4, ncol = 2)) sce <- convert_seurat_to_sce(seurat_obj) } # }

title: Convert SingleCellExperiment to AnnData — convert_to_anndata
text: function converts SingleCellExperiment (SCE) object AnnData object. processes assays, dimensional reductions, metadata, including alternative experiments (altExps). main assay used primary data matrix AnnData object.

title: Convert SingleCellExperiment to AnnData — convert_to_anndata
text: sce SingleCellExperiment object converted. assayName name assay use main data matrix AnnData. Defaults "counts". useAltExp Logical indicating whether process include alternative experiments (altExps). Defaults TRUE.

title: Convert SingleCellExperiment to AnnData — convert_to_anndata
text: AnnData object containing data SingleCellExperiment object.

title: Convert SingleCellExperiment to AnnData — convert_to_anndata
text: function first prints summary input SingleCellExperiment object checks alternative experiments (altExps). altExps found, processed recursively stored `uns` slot AnnData object, unless `useAltExp` parameter set FALSE. specified assay used primary data matrix (anndata.X), assays stored `layers` slot. Dimensional reductions stored `obsm` slot, metadata organized `obs`, `var`, `obsp`, `varp`, `uns` slots appropriate. function includes detailed error handling ensure data correctly transferred AnnData object.

title: Convert SingleCellExperiment to AnnData — convert_to_anndata
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(SingleCellExperiment) library(anndata) sce <- SingleCellExperiment::SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = matrix(1:4, ncol = 2))) ad <- convert_to_anndata(sce) } # }
